page.title: 04Family Life in Haslington.
page.content: Much of the family life is centred in and around the village.Many couples have young families and this influences greatly the activities of the family. The majority of fathers are the main earner of the family although this is now becoming less of the norm Many families have moved into the area because of its attractiveness and commute to larger places of work. Family holidays are dictated by the parents' work, the main holiday period being in July to coincide with those of Rolls Royce works.
